about_the_game:
The Onami girls' endlessly affectionate brother developed asthma at a young age, which left him bedridden for much of his early life. Now that his health has improved, he does his best to make up for lost time through online learning. His medical researcher parents have used the unique opportunity his illness provides to gather data about his condition, which has greatly contributed to medical science. As a result, they've encouraged him to get plenty of sleep and lead a calm, relaxing life so that he'll make for a better research subject and help people all over the world. However, those same parents throw a wrench into his peaceful life when they come up with an idea to boost immunity through hugging. Now every evening he has to choose one of his sisters to hug! What will Onii-chan do when faced with this sudden and weighty responsibility?

Embark into the world of sisterly love and tight hugs in this beautifully drawn visual novel! The rich story will keep you captivated as you navigate through the individual character stories and reveal more about each sister. Choose your options and shape the story the way you want!

You Control Your Hugs

Hug your sisters with all your might! With the Click Hug feature, you can hug them however long and hard you need to get that natural dose of endorphins!

Choose Your Sister

You can hug any of your sisters! Choose who you want to squeeze in your arms and hug with all your love.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: When two researchers are desperate to find a way to help their sickly son, they come up with a unique course of treatment... by hugging!
